wikipedia_page.main: Maggie Macdonald (née Michie; 17 November 1952 – 26 July 2016) was a Scottish Gaelic singer and primary school teacher. She was a Mòd gold medallist and sang with the Gaelic super-group, Cliar. She was part of The Campbells Of Greepe, along with other family members.

response: *26 July – Maggie Macdonald, singer in Scottish Gaelic (born 1952)
*Maggie Macdonald, 63, Scottish Gaelic singer.Obituary: Maggie Macdonald, Gaelic singer
